meanings.definition: A widely distributed evergreen shrub or tree with glossy, spiny-toothed leaves and red berries.
meanings.sent1: The holly in our garden has shiny leaves and red berries.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, people decorate their homes with holly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the holly bushes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a cluster of holly berries.
meanings.sent5: The holly tree stood proudly in the winter landscape.

meanings.definition: The wood of the holly tree, used for inlay work.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carefully carved the holly wood for the intricate design.
meanings.sent2: The antique table had beautiful holly inlay patterns.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the holly wood pieces, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like polished holly wood in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The holly inlay added a touch of elegance to the furniture.
